title: BALANCE | Advanced Wellbeing Supplements - Clinique La Prairie
description: Your path to reach equilibrium. BALANCE is your new essential wellbeing supplement to meet daily mind and body nutritional needs. Order online.
cleaned_text: Holistic Complex with exclusive fusion of 5 bioactive compounds: NEUROMICS, SYNERITHIN, IMMUCELL, NIEHANYL and supplement features NEUROMICS as Compound Explosion: integrated in a higher concentration to enhance the stimulation of brain and cognitive functions. ESSENTIAL WELLBEING SUPPLEMENT Niacin, Calcium, Selenium, Zinc, Manganese, Molybdenum, Beta-Carotene, Folic Vitamin B6, Vitamin B7 (Biotin), Vitamin B12, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E, Vitamin K. REST AND RESET SUPPLEMENT L-Tryptophan, Bluenesse®, Passionflower Extract, Valerian Extract. Vitamin B6, Niacin, Magnesium. about the benefits of some key foundation's ingredients: Bluenesse® - Known to boost mental clarity, balance mood and improve stress reactivity. Studies show that this extract, derived from Lemon Balm Melissa officinalis (L.) exhibits beneficial effects on cognitive performance. L-Tryptophan - Recognized to boost the production of the chemical Serotonin, which influences sleep and mood. Passiflora Incarnata (Passionflower extract): Known to help relieve anxiety and sleep disorders. Contact us for more information.
